participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys storytelling and music.
participant_1.background: I dropped the dogs off at the kennel before heading to my parents' house. I play the guitar while I wear comfortable clothes and write my stories. Unfortunately, my family lives across the country from me. I am in a very intimate and loving relationship. I need a wheelchair to get around.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Inquisitive and adventurous, loves learning and trying new things.
participant_2.background: I'm a lifelong learner who loves to devour books and explore new things. I miss the days when I could afford to drive my own car. I enjoy building computers. I love to weld and rock climb! I wake up early and start practicing my celebrity impressions.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing great! I'm a lifelong learner who loves to devour books and explore new things. How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm writing a story about my life and I'm enjoying playing the guitar while I wear comfortable clothes.
That sounds really cool! I love to write stories too! I wish I could play the guitar.
You should learn! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to relax.
I know, I know! I've always wanted to learn. Maybe I'll take a class this year.
That would be great! I'm sure you'd love it.
Thanks! I'm sure I would too!
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love building computers, welding, and rock climbing!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to try welding.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely try it.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer. I love my job!
That's awesome! I'm a writer. I love my job too!
That's great! I love hearing about people who love their jobs
